sentences.english: Adult dolphins are from 2 to 4 metres long and weigh from 150 to 650 kg.
sentences.chinese: 成年海豚体长2至4米，体重150至350公斤。

sentences.english: In addition, deltamethrin caused the death or shortened, the body-length of the larvae.
sentences.chinese: 溴氰菊酯致死的部分中华按蚊幼虫体长缩短。

sentences.english: The values of K decreases with increase in fish size (body length).
sentences.chinese: 肥满度系数随体长的增长而降低。

sentences.english: The specimens were tested in a universal testing machine.
sentences.chinese: 用电子万能测试机于核的舌侧垂直牙体长轴加载。

sentences.english: Adult female brown, paler mantle pilgrimaging length of about 17 mm, the male moth slightly smaller.
sentences.chinese: 成虫淡灰褐色，雌娥体长约17毫米，雄蛾略小。

sentences.english: The male's tail feathers are twice the length of its body and end in disc-shaped 'spatules'.
sentences.chinese: 雄性尾羽的长度两倍于体长并以“叉向抹刀状”告终。

sentences.english: She’s reached the 4-pound mark and measures 17 inches.
sentences.chinese: 她已经超过了4磅的记录，体长17英寸。

sentences.english: Your baby is putting on pounds and adding inches at a furious clip these days.
sentences.chinese: 婴儿这些日子体重和体长都增加迅速。

sentences.english: The ovary length and body length were positively related during the whole ovary development.
sentences.chinese: 日本新糠虾卵巢长与体长间有正相关。

sentences.english: A red-billed leiothrix about 14 cm in length.
sentences.chinese: 红嘴相思鸟体长约14厘米。

sentences.english: Finches are small, compact birds 3-10 in. (10-27 cm) long.
sentences.chinese: 雀类体型小而结实，体长10～27公分。

sentences.english: Adult males have wings, length of about 17 mm, dark brown.
sentences.chinese: 雄成虫有翅，体长约17毫米，暗褐色。

sentences.english: Cloudiness near the center of the lens, however, usually interferes with clear sight.
sentences.chinese: 然而如果混浊体长在晶状体的中间，通常会影响视力。

sentences.english: Titanoboa, which measured up to 45 feet long, was the world's longest ever snake.
sentences.chinese: 泰坦蟒体长可达45英尺，是已知的世界上最长的蛇。

sentences.english: The Russian sturgeon is a large, bony fish that can reach a length of more than 6 feet.
sentences.chinese: 俄国鲟是一种大型多骨鱼，体长可以达到6英尺以上。

sentences.english: The testicular structure changes with season and total length of the shark.
sentences.chinese: 精巢的结构随体长和季节的更动而变化。

definition: height (of person)/length of clothing from shoulders to bottom (tailor or dressmaker's measure)
bony fishes/Osteichthyes (taxonomic class including most fish)
(bird species of China) blue-breasted quail (Coturnix chinensis)
